SELECT t1.id, t1.`name`, t1.sort, t1.type, t1.input_method, t1.selectable_values, t2.NAME attributeGroupName, t3.NAME categoryName, t1.create_time FROM `pms_attribute` t1 LEFT JOIN pms_attribute_group t2 ON t1.attribute_group_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN pms_category t3 ON t2.category_id = t3.id
t1.is_deleted = 0
AND ( t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') OR t2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') OR t3.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%') )
AND t1.attribute_group_id = #{queryParams.groupId}
ORDER BY t2.sort DESC, t1.sort DESC

SELECT t1.id, t1.`name`, t2.id attribute_group_id, t2.`name` attribute_group_name FROM pms_attribute t1 INNER JOIN pms_attribute_group t2 ON t1.attribute_group_id = t2.id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.category_id = #{categoryId} AND t1.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t2.sort DESC, t1.sort DESC
